title: Revenue of Sonic Corporation in the U.S. from 2009 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2009 to 2010, and lastly roughly constant from 2010 to 2013.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 706.28 was reported at Year 2009
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 542.59 was reached at Year 2013
